```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = F)
options(scipen=999)

library(tidyverse)
library(ggsci)
library(here)
library(knitr)
library(stargazer)
library(kableExtra)

library(MQMF)

devtools::install_github("james-thorson/FishLife")
library(FishLife)
```

```{r assessment}

# Get basic plot for Lutjanus campechanus (in database, so prediction is informed by species-specific data)
Plot_taxa( Search_species(Genus="Totoaba",Species="macdonaldi")$match_taxonomy )

params = matrix( c("K","M", "G", "r" ,"ln_MASPS"), ncol=2, byrow=TRUE)
Predict = Plot_taxa( Search_species(Genus="Totoaba",Species="macdonaldi")$match_taxonomy, mfrow=c(2,2) )

```

```{r, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
knitr::kable(Predict[[1]]$Mean_pred, digits=3)

Predict[[1]]$Mean_pred %>%
  kbl() %>%
  kable_styling()
```
